name: Tesla: The Weather Man
detailed_description:
The triumph of alternating current has sent Edison into a violent rage. It's up to you, Nikola Tesla, to stop him and his army of DC-powered robots. Use experimental technology to harness the power of lightning, levitation, rain, sun, and snow! Dodge bullets and solve physics-based puzzles in an absurd historical parody.

Prove once and for all that you are the true greatest man of science!

Featuring:
  • Five mad science powers
  • 29 hand-painted levels
  • Fully-voiced cutscenes and tutorial
  • Research weather control upgrades and other perks
  • Multiple solutions to most puzzles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP1 or later
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX 9 Shader Model 2.0 support (practically anything since 2005)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
